name: war_commander
description:
"War Commander" is a super fun strategy game! In the game, as the leader of the legion, you not only need to build a business base, but also lead your legion to compete and confront global players fiercely! Build and develop, build troops and fight; defend positions and plunder resources.

Unity of offense and defense

Build your military base and keep upgrading to become stronger! Reasonable layout defense settings to resist attacks from other opponents! Produce and train various combat units to plunder other players' castles! The combination of offense and defense is exquisite, and strategy is the key to deciding the battle!

Easy to operate

Awesome military cartoon style, beautiful pictures, convenient interactive gameplay. The rules are simple and easy to understand, with a high degree of familiarity, and the numerical system is designed in a balanced manner. Additional battle modes for a brand new gaming experience! Shotguns, planes, Gundams, a modern technological melee!

Highlight immediacy

Production troops, a variety of different combat units with varying capabilities. Choose different opponents and aim at your target arbitrarily among players around the world. Develop a strategy and choose an attacking method based on the opponent's defensive layout. The troops that start to be placed will attack in automatic battles!

Build a fort

Arrange the turrets, and multiple turrets will be intertwined into a fire defense line. Drop the city walls, delay the enemy's attack, and change the way forward. Using traps, once you step into the trap's range, you will take huge damage. Automatic combat, no need to operate, automatic attack with the invading enemy.

Form a military alliance

Join the alliance and fight with like-minded friends! Ask for support, the Allies make a lot of sense on offense or defense. Small support can have unexpected results. Various rich rewards and rewards, the strongest military alliance will get additional system rewards!
